context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: contact the drug manufacturer directly
explore all possible options such as:

explore different options such as talking to the doctor about any cheaper alternatives, signing up for a patient assistance program, checking out local charities or organizations that help with medical costs, or starting a fundraising campaign

explore various options, such as applying for financial aid from healthcare organizations, appealing to a patient assistance program run by the drug manufacturer, discussing payment plans or discounts with the pharmaceutical company or doctor, or seeking help from online fundraising platforms or non-profit organizations

seek out help from various sources like charitable institutions, government agencies, or pharmaceutical companies that might offer patient assistance programs

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. call a taxi, Uber, or any available ride service to quickly transport him to the airport
call for roadside assistance or a tow truck while also arranging for a taxi service or ride share to get him to the airport as quickly as possible while his car is taken care of
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other quick transportation service
call for a taxi, Uber, or Lyft or any other type of car service that can quickly get him to the airport
call a taxi or a ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft to ensure he gets to the airport on time

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.

generation: report the missing money to his supervisor or the store's owner and assure them that he will fully cooperate with any investigation that takes place
review the day's transactions to see if there were any accounting errors or discrepancies

thoroughly check the area around the register to ensure the money wasn't misplaced
check CCTV footage, if any, to see if there was any stealing

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.

generation: stay put and create a visible signal such as a large SOS or a smoke signal from a fire to draw attention
stay calm and prevent panic among the group, ensuring that everyone stays together in one spot

stay put and create a highly visible signal to attract the attention of the rescue crew
